comment: This is considered "garbage" by the Swedish SJW government now, with its Muzzie cultural minister (or whatever that position is). Girl needs to hold onto this sword or the government will destroy it as part of its drive to destroy/erase the past that clearly showed what Sweden was and SHOULD be.
